name: Aj.Toy
wishText: I wish for your skies to always be clear and bright.  ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy ...
text2: It's really special that I get to be in your life on your birthday again.
text3: Thank you so much for being there for me through both the good and the bad times.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: And I hope you think of me sometimes.
replayText: click or restart, if you want to watch it again.
